metadata.title: Bering Sea and Shelikof Strait Pressure Data (1975-1982)

creators.name: Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL)

metadata.description:
Aanderra pressure gauge data were recorded from 1975 to 1982 during the MIZEX West, OCSEAP and FOCI projects. These data are stored on 56 disk files (2.9 MB) at the Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory in Seattle, Washington. NOAAServer
Codes: [L 72 54 -150 -175] ; nodateline
